column1:
Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, sanitation and hygiene services (per 100,000 population)
SDG 3.9 By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
Dimension: Environmental sustainability
Definition: Deaths attributable to unsafe water, sanitation and hygiene focusing on inadequate wash services, expressed per 100,000 population.
Source: WHO (World Health Organization) (2019). Global Health Observatory. www.who.int/gho/. Accessed 15 July 2019.

column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development
